class.name: QMeshRectNode
class.description: QMeshRectNode provides various settings to help you create rectangle-shaped meshes. [b]Note:[/b] These helper types of QMeshNode, once added to the scene, are converted into a typical QMeshNode with particles, spring connections, UV mappings, and a polygon. After being added to the scene, all modifications and adjustments should be done using the general methods of QMeshNode, rather than the member properties defined here.

method.name: set_particle_radius
method.description: Sets the radius of particles in the mesh.

members.member: The center position of the rectangle.

This property generates a grid-like structure for the rectangular mesh using particles and connections. It is especially useful for rectangular meshes that require more particles and connections in soft body dynamics.
The radius of particles in the mesh.
